Keyboard shortcuts for Zoom on MacOS

A visual cheat-sheet for the 32 keyboard shortcuts found in Zoom. These shortcuts are for MacOS, for Windows visit /zoom-windows.

Original Reference Report Issue

Meetings

Join meeting

  • Cmd
  • J

Start meeting

  • Cmd
  • Ctrl
  • V

Schedule meeting

  • Cmd
  • J

Screen share via direct share

  • Cmd
  • Ctrl
  • S

Mute or unmute audio

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • A

Mute audio for everyone except the host, only available to the host

  • Cmd
  • Ctrl
  • U

Push to talk

  • Space

Start or stop video

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • V

Switch camera

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • N

Start or stop screen share

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • S

Pause or resume screen share

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • T

Start local recording

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • R

Start cloud recording

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • C

Pause or resume recording

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • P

Switch to active speaker view or gallery view, depending on current view

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • W

View previous 25 participants in gallery view

  • Ctrl
  • P

View next 25 participants in gallery view

  • Ctrl
  • N

Display or hide participants panel

  • Cmd
  • U

Show or hide in-meeting chat panel

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • H

Open invite window

  • Cmd
  • I

Raise hand or lower hand

  • Opt
  • Y

Gain remote control

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • R

Stop remote control

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • G

Enter or exit full screen

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • F

Switch to minimal window

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • M

Show or hide meeting controls

  • Ctrl
  • Opt
  • Cmd
  • H

Prompt to end or leave meeting

  • Cmd
  • W

Chat Shortcuts

Jump to chat with someone

  • Cmd
  • K

Screenshot

  • Cmd
  • T

General Shortcuts

Close the current window

  • Cmd
  • W

Switch to portrait or landscape view, depending on current view

  • Cmd
  • L

Switch from one tab to the next

  • Ctrl
  • T
